description: Entity type ontology for KG triple tagging

labels.Event: Occurrences that unfold over time and whose identity depends on their temporal extent. Includes actions, events, pandemics, sports seasons, and competition results.
labels.Agent: Intentional actors capable of actions, such as organizations, or fictional characters.
labels.Place: Entities defined primarily by spatial location, such as geographic areas or regions.
labels.Artifact: Man-made physical objects whose identity is determined by design or function. Includes devices, means of transportation, and architectural structures.
labels.BiologicalEntity: Biologically grounded entities sharing biological identity criteria. Includes anatomical structures, biomolecules, species (humans, animals, plants), and diseases.
labels.Substance: Material entities defined by their composition. Includes food and chemical substances, regardless of processing.
labels.SocialEntity: Entities defined by social convention or collective agreement. Includes ethnic groups, medical specialties, and person functions.
labels.Work: Socially or institutionally recognized products or systems. Includes creative works, awards, languages, and currencies.
labels.Colour: A perceptual visual property resulting from the interaction of light with surfaces.
labels.Identifier: Abstract identifiers or naming units used for reference or measurement. Includes identifiers, names, and units of work.
labels.TopicalConcept: Abstract concepts or subject matters associated with a specific domain of knowledge.
labels.TimePeriod: Abstract temporal intervals or spans of time.
labels.Unknown: Used only when the entity type cannot be determined from the given context.
